_gram:
({#stOti-stavIti, stute-stuvIte#};
{#tuzwAva-tuzwuve, astAvIt-astozwa, stozyati-te#},
{#stotuM, stuta#}; {%<ab>desid.</ab>%} {#tuzwUzati-te#}; the {#s#} of
{#stu#} is changed to {#z#} after a 
preposition ending in {#i#} or {#u#})
_meanings:
{@--1@} To praise,
laud, eulogize, extol, glorify, 
celebrate; <ls>Bv. 1. 41</ls>; <ls>Mu. 3. 16</ls>;  
<ls>Bk. 8. 92</ls>, <ls n="Bk.">15. 70</ls>, <ls n="Bk.">3.</ls>

{@--2@} To celebrate or
praise in song, to hymn, worship by
hymns.
